name: The Lost Resort
description:
A volcanic eruption has devastated the exclusive Imboko Island, and an ancient evil has awakened. Only one man can confront the demonic hordes and save the hapless guests - The Caretaker!



  • A retro 2D platform shooter with intriguing characters and challenging puzzles to solve.
  • More than 150 hand-crafted areas and challenges to master. Powerful skills and weapon upgrades to unlock, and endless traps and secrets to discover.
  • An engaging narrative set in a crumbling luxury resort under siege from monsters and slowly being consumed by lava. Just how deep are the ancient catacombs beneath the hotel, and who is the mysterious figure with control over all of the electrical devices on the island?

Simple keyboard and mouse controls make the platforming and shooting easy and accurate. Each room poses a unique challenge that may test your mind as much as your reflexes.

So pack your bags and come visit the island known as... The Lost Resort!
